law.catch_line: On receipt of the Commissioner's letter of preliminary approval, the board of directors of the conve...

text.section: On receipt of the Commissioner's letter of preliminary approval, the board of directors of the converting association shall call a meeting of the members for the purpose of considering the plan of conversion to a commercial bank.
At least 10 days, but not more than 90 days, before the meeting, the converting association shall mail notice of the meeting to all members entitled to vote.
